inclusion.criterion: liver biopsy, are consented to phase II, and do not have known CAD defined as prior
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) or have
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects undergoing this portion of the analysis will need a renal function panel within 30 days of the scan date with a glomerular filtration rate (GFR) of ≥ 60 mls/min/1.73m2 by the Cockcroft-Gault equation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no prior history of an allergic reaction to intravenous CT contrast, and no contraindications to administration of sublingual nitroglycerin and nodal blocking agents
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: the subject. This questionnaire will include data such as race and ethnic group, past medical history, current medications, etc.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: greater or equal to 5% steatosis on MRI or liver stiffness greater than 7 kPa on Fibroscan®, or evidence of fibrosis on MRE or LIF score of 2.0 or greater
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
